headline: KKR Explores Acquisition of New Mexico Utility Owner TXNM
summary: (Bloomberg) -- KKR & Co. is exploring an acquisition of TXNM Energy Inc., the owner of New Mexico’s largest utility, according to people familiar with the matter. headline: Thames Water aims to agree takeover by end of June as mulls approaches
summary: Thames Water said it has received six takeover approaches from potential suitors to buy the company, and that it hopes to agree a deal by the end of June.The company said talks are ongoing and that...
